thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Gary R
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Gary R

author: Gary R
title: Gary R
text: I ordered a few books from abebooks.com. One was from Atlanta Book Company (subsidey for this company I'm guessing) and I received it in a few days. The other books were being processed by the time I received this book! It was in the shape as described. From now on, every book I purchase, I will be searching Atlanta Book Company first to see if they have a copy. I cannot state how truly excellent their service was! I wish I had known about them before purchasing other books at an earlier time!
